title: Seducing Usha: A taboo forbidden love affair
description: Karan, a young man falls head over heels in love with Usha.But, his love is destined to end in disaster. The moment he laid eyes on her is the moment she was getting married to his elder brother!!Karan tries his best to control his desires and emotions and bury his love for his sister in law, however, fate plays a cruel joke on both of them, throwing them in situations completely out of their control but designed to fuel their desires and need for each other more and more, until finally breaking all boundaries!Read the book to find out Karan's struggle with his emotions, desires, guilt and how ultimately he was able to fulfill his dreams
author: Alon Bard
